slides.title: Consolidation
slides.content:
# Group Accounts

## Goodwill

```
Consideration
+ NCI at acquisition
- FV of net assets
= Goodwill
```

## Adjustments

| Item | Treatment |
|------|----------|
| Investment | Eliminate |
| Intercompany | Cancel |
| PURP | Remove |
| Fair values | Adjust |

## NCI Methods

- Full goodwill
- Proportionate share

slides.title: Audit and Assurance
slides.content:
# AA Module

## Audit Process

```
1. Engagement
2. Planning
3. Risk assessment
4. Evidence gathering
5. Completion
6. Reporting
```

## Audit Risk

```
AR = IR x CR x DR

Lower DR needed when IR or CR high
```

slides.title: Financial Management
slides.content:
# FM Module

## Working Capital

```
NWC = CA - CL

Cash cycle = Inventory + Receivables - Payables
```

## Investment Appraisal

| Method | Criterion |
|--------|----------|
| NPV | > 0 |
| IRR | > Cost of capital |
| Payback | < Target |
| ARR | > Target |

slides.title: Corporate Finance
slides.content:
# Financing Decisions

## Cost of Capital

```
WACC = (E/V x Ke) + (D/V x Kd x (1-T))

Ke (CAPM) = Rf + beta(Rm - Rf)
```

## Capital Structure

| Theory | View |
|--------|------|
| MM (no tax) | Irrelevant |
| MM (tax) | Debt adds value |
| Trade-off | Optimal exists |

slides.title: Business Valuation
slides.content:
# Valuation Methods

## Approaches

| Method | Basis |
|--------|-------|
| Asset | Net assets |
| Income | Earnings/CF |
| Market | Comparables |

## DCF Model

```
Value = Sum of PV(FCF) + PV(Terminal)

Terminal = FCF(1+g) / (WACC - g)
```

slides.title: Taxation
slides.content:
# TX Module

## Tax Computation

```
Income
- Deductions
= Taxable income
x Rate
= Tax liability
- Credits
= Tax payable
```
